about_the_game:
What is OKUBI?

Okubi is a fast-paced PvP combat game that blends intense battles across various arenas and battlegrounds. Visit vibrant social hubs to meet with tons of players, customize your character's build and queue up for your next match to climb through the ranks!

FUSION OF AERIAL AND GROUND COMBATS

Experience OKUBI's unique combat system and feel clutch movements in a never-seen-before combinaison of aerial prowesses and ground abilities.

ARENAS AND BATTLEGROUNDS

Step into the arena! Engage in intense 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, and various team-based battlegrounds. Slay enemy players or complete challenges to claim mythic rewards! Ascend through ranked tiers and become the undisputed champion.

SOCIAL HUB EXPERIENCE

Meet tons of other players in various Hubs where you can form parties, craft powerful equipment and partake in mini-games. Unlock more luxurious and convenient towns as you progress!

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

Build and upgrade your character to adapt it's combat skills to your playstyle. Customize your weapons with dynamic buffs, adding unique trigger effects that enhance your character and increase strategic depth in combat.

ELEMENTAL ATTUNEMENTS

Harness the power of the 5 Elements to define your combat style. Infuse your weapons with unique effects and unleash devastating abilities, turning every encounter into a test of skill and strategy.

PROCEDURAL EVENTS

Experience dynamic gameplay in Okubi as the mysterious Yōkai can spawn unpredictable events directly onto the battlefield, keeping you on your toes and adding an element of surprise to each match!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 SP1+
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMDFX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz or better.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Asio Standard

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: OKUBI is a fast-paced, action-packed PVP combat game with a unique combat style! Dive into diverse arenas, competitive team battlegrounds, and an epic open-world map full of encounters. Meet other players in vibrant public hubs, form squads, and customize your build before your next match!
